scripts.copy:dx: cpx "node_modules/devextreme-dist/css/dx.fluent.blue.compact.css" wwwroot/lib/devextreme/css && cpx "node_modules/devextreme-dist/css/dx.spreadsheet.css" wwwroot/lib/devextreme/css && cpx "node_modules/devextreme-dist/js/dx.all.js" wwwroot/lib/devextreme/js && cpx -C "node_modules/devextreme-dist/fonts/**/*" wwwroot/lib/devextreme/fonts && cpx -C "node_modules/devextreme-dist/css/icons/**/*" wwwroot/lib/devextreme/css/icons && cpx "node_modules/devexpress-aspnetcore-spreadsheet/dist/dx-aspnetcore-spreadsheet.js" wwwroot/lib/devextreme/js && cpx "node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js" wwwroot/lib/jquery
scripts.postinstall: npm run clean:dx && npm run copy:dx
